reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Energy and Environment Partnership Program (EEP) in Indonesia, budget extension

description.narrative: Energy and Environment Partnership Program (EEP) aims to increase access to sustainable renewable energy and reduce the growth rate of greenhoue gases in Indonesia. The program promotes wider use of renewable energy and cleaner technology as well as energy efficiency in the rural communities especially among poor and women. The program is especially targeting biomass for energy and is centred in two provinces Riau and Central Kalimantan. The EEP provides co-financing for projects on biomass for energy imple mented by community based organisations NGO's and public and private sector. The program also provides support for capasity building in the target areas.
